name: 10-react-rest-api-app
description: > built with Express, Nodejs and Sequelize

scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && npm install && npm run start" "cd client && npm install && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix api && npm start --prefix api && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Seokhyun Wie
